## 장비소개

-   Automated DNA/RNA prep

-   Various sample types (spin-column)

-   QIAGEN spin Kit

-   Blood & Tissue, DNA Mini, Fecal, RNA, Viral RNA

-   Maximum 12 samples

-   Applications

    -   Sequencing/sequencing analysis, gene expression analysis, genotyping, proteomics, microbiome research
